Body:
Description: I just received a security advisory. 

Please provide the offline updates and or patches please. 
Server ID: OFFL0000
v.5.9.3.0 currently
What We've Learned Updated: The customer requested the offline patch for the newer EPP Server versions.
Next Steps Updated: The offline patch for the 5940 server version was shared and I will have to share the offline patch for 5941 server version once it will be available.
